ComicInfo.Title: Tardzan the Apish Man; How Time Has Changed the Comedians!; Goonlighting; Cracked Interviews Broke Shields the Glamour Queen; You Know You're a Robot...; Tour of the Cracked Magazine Offices; Alieens; Cracked Milestones!; Blundercats; What's on Their Minds?; Familiar Ties; Evolution of Smythe
ComicInfo.Summary: Hudd and Dini hide inside garbage cans which are used by a street musician as drums.
